channel.title: Posts on ug_pwn
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on ug_pwn

item.description: Steps to Extract the Flag from the Heap Dump Download the Heap Dump Run the following command to download the heap snapshot file: curl -o heapdump.heapsnapshot http://verbal-sleep.picoctf.net:52837/heapdump Inspect the Heap Dump Heap dumps are usually in JSON format. You can analyze it using: cat heapdump.heapsnapshot | less Or pretty-print it: jq . heapdump.heapsnapshot | less Search for the Flag Pattern Since the flag format is usually picoCTF{...}, you can try:
